When you get a post that just lacks any coherence, you still feel obligated to respond, though it is such a chore. I instead propose you refer people to this link: http://petit.philou.free.fr/
 
 Often this site has all the required information to explain the problems of arguements laced with logical falacies and the like.

title: 4Forums.com Political Debates and Polls -  The perfect Refutation
